string-array.item: There is no sincerer love than the love of food \n ~ George Bernard Shaw
One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well.\n ~ Virginia Woolf
Health is not valued till sickness comes.\n ~ Thomas Fuller
In wine there is wisdom, in beer there is strength, in water there is bacteria. \n ~ David Auerbach
The secret of success in life is to eat what you like and let the food fight it out inside. \n ~ Mark Twain
